page.title: 01GLOUCESTER CITY GAZETTEER 85
page.content: THE OLD CITY AREA HAS THE CATHEDRAL, SHIRE HALL,GUILDHALL,BUSINESS CENTRE, NEW SHOPPING CENTRE,NEW MARKET, MUSEUM LIBRARY,POLICE STATION,B.TELECOM,JAIL, HOSPITAL,RAILWAY STATION,RESTAURANTS AND HOTELS. WESTWARDS FARMLAND SURROUNDS THE RIVER SEVERN AND ITS NEW BRIDGE SYSTEM. THE CANAL WHARVES HANDLE MOST CARGOES AS THE OLD DOCK IS CONVERTING TO A MARINA AND ITS WAREHOUSES INTO OFFICE AND COMMERCIAL BUILDINGS. NEW ENGINEERING WORKS AND TRADING ESTATES ARE DEVELOPING ON FORMER INDUSTRIAL SITES. ALONG BRISTOL ROAD REPLACEMENT OF VICTORIAN ROWS OF HOUSES BY BLOCKS OF FLATS IS TAKING PLACE AND RING ROADS AND RELIEF ROADS ARE DEVELOPING TO EASE TRAFFIC CONGESTION.
